text:
The police on Thursday night arrested a 21-year-old youth on charges of sexually assaulting a Standard X girl in Namagiripettai here recently.

The police said that Arul Pandi promised to marry the girl and committed the crime.

On Thursday, the girl informed her parents about the incident. Based on a compliant, the police registered a case under Sections 5 (l) r/w 6 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012.
title: Youth held for sexual assault
